snippet: Syrian government recaptured Qaryatain from retreating Islamic State militants who had abducted and terrorized dozens of Christian residents there.
abstract: Syrian government troops fire celebratory shots hours after recapturing historic, and now ravaged, town of Qaryatain from Islamic State militants.
lead_paragraph: Syrian government recaptured Qaryatain from retreating Islamic State militants who had abducted and terrorized dozens of Christian residents there.

headline.main: Syria: Town Retaken From Islamic State
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: Town Retaken From Islamic State
